definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: Any purchase of a little potassium permanganate for individual self-use need not be put on archives.
sentences.chinese: 個人自用購買少量高錳酸鉀的，無須備案。

sentences.english: The Shareholder shall cause the Company to report such appointment to the original examination and approval authority for the record.
sentences.chinese: 股東應責成公司將該委任報原審批機關備案。

sentences.english: Report the examined and approved qualified suppliers list of this project to company for record.
sentences.chinese: 將本項目審定合格的供貨商名單報公司備案。

sentences.english: Added rules for recordal of trademark license.
sentences.chinese: 增加了商標許可備案的規則。

sentences.english: The customs house shall examine the Archival Filing Form submitted by the consignor or consignee;
sentences.chinese: 海關應當對收發貨人提交的《備案表》進行審覈。

sentences.english: No record-keeping may be conducted for those applications that fail to meet the requirements upon examination.
sentences.chinese: 備案申請經審覈不符合要求的，不予備案。

sentences.english: No record-keeping may be conducted for those applications that fail to meet the requirements upon examination.
sentences.chinese: 備案申請經審覈不符合要求的，不予備案。

sentences.english: The document must be delivered to the office of the secretary of state for filing.
sentences.chinese: 文件須提交州務卿辦公室備案。

sentences.english: The source of each primary reference standard should be documented.
sentences.chinese: 每一個基本參考標準品的來源要備案。

sentences.english: The aforesaid person shall be reported to the administrative department of the Intellectual Property Portals for archival filing.
sentences.chinese: 上述人員須報知識產權門戶網站管理部門備案。

sentences.english: Define in the agreement who is in charge of the recordal operation.
sentences.chinese: 在協議中明確主管登記備案方。
登記手續，併到勞動保障行政部門辦理變更備案手續。

sentences.english: The local standards for the discharge of water pollutants must be reported to the environmental protection department of the State Council for the record.
sentences.chinese: 地方水污染物排放標準須報國務院環境保護部門備案。

sentences.english: The drafting body shall promptly provide relevant materials for submission filing.
sentences.chinese: 起草單位應當及時提供報送備案的相關材料。

sentences.english: The percentage who donate, however, has consistently been less than 3 percent of filers.
sentences.chinese: 然而，捐贈人申報百分比一直低於備案的3%。

sentences.english: Can be used by recorded in the in charge of Customs or Shenzhen Customs.
sentences.chinese: 在主管海關或深圳海關任意方備案均可用。

definition: to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
